parameters: <After a good rest, you are full of energy again>\!
<Today is March \v[50],\. but you shouldn't worry
too much and live today the fullest>
<It's evening and you've finished dinner>\!
<You can go to bed or wander around the town>\!
<A story suddenly pops in your mind>\.
<You are unable to recall from where is it from>
The title of the particular story is "Tale of the Mighty Demon"
Once upon a time...\.
In the deepest of hell,\. there lived a big demon.\|
He is strong,\. dependable,\. and everybody rely on him.
"Hey, help us build a new storage" A demon asked.\|
"Help us hunting" Another demon showed up.\|
"Can you patrol this night?" Said yet another demon.\|
More and more demons show up, just to ask for help.\.
This special demon is blessed with enormous amount
of strength, hence all their problems solved.
<It's all you can remember for now>
<A story suddenly pops in your mind>\.
<It is the continuation of the last piece>
One day, in the middle of his hunting, he encountered a
small angel. \|She was wounded,\. writhing in pain,\. having her
wings scattered into pieces.
She shouldn't be in hell,\. yet she doesn't want to went back
to heaven either.\. As heaven is the source of her sufferings.
A place full of light, as well as shadows.
The demon kneeled down so he can see her eyes clearly.\.\.
An emerald eyes, full of despair,\. as if she doesn't know
how she is still alive,\. despite of wanting to begone forever.
Without saying anything,\. the demon carried the angel
on his back,\. then walked to his home slowly.
<You are still unable to remember where is it from>
<A story suddenly pops in your mind>\.
<It is the continuation of the last piece>
The angel lived with the mighty demon.\. She would take care
of things the demon wouldn't care about :\. himself.
From heating the bath so it's in ideal temperature, \.
cooking foods that is enjoyable, not just consumable,\.
even she would give the demon all the praises he deserved.
They enjoyed their lives,\. though from two different worlds.\|
But,\. everything is the opposite for other demons.
They want more attention,\. though only ever think of themself.\|
They want more service,\. as if they are the owner of the hell.\|
They want everything,\. though never giving anything.
<You are still unable to remember where is it from>
<A story suddenly pops in your mind>\.
<It is the continuation of the last piece>
The demons plotted a 'revenge' for the mighty demon, \.
for not abiding to their words,\. for staying beside
the angel's side.
"Should we bully the angel?"\|
An idea comes up,\. fuelled with their hatred,\. or maybe
envy towards the angel.
Other demons agreed.\.\. They thought the angel deserve
nothing but sadness.\.\. Happiness is theirs to own, \.nobody
else should have it, even the mighty demon.
Blinded with meaningless emotion, they started to
secretly torture the helpless angel, threatening her
to crush both their lives if she tells the mighty demon.
...After some time, they realized...\|
Realized how fun stomping on someone is.
<You are still unable to remember where is it from>
<A story suddenly pops in your mind>\.
<It is the continuation of the last piece>
"Hey" The little angel called the mighty demon.\.
they both stood in the corner of their home,\.
contemplating on their fate.
"Let's run away together" she said to him.
The mighty demon was speechless. He still couldn't
believe on his fellow demons turning their back on him.
"No"\. The mighty demon replied.\.
"Why?"\. The little angel asked.\.
"Because they need me"\. The mighty demon asnwered.
"I also need you" The angel said, bringing silence
between them once again.
A silence which reveals the true voice of the demons.\.
A silence which reveals the enemies between friends.\.
The demons who were in the way to raid their home.
<You are still unable to remember where is it from>
<A story suddenly pops in your mind>\.
<It is the continuation of the last piece>
The mighty demon carried the little angel,\. running
through the heat of hell.\. His mind is in chaos,\.
as he didn't know what have he done to deserve this.
Meanwhile, the little angel just stared emptily to the
red sky. Heaven's sky was bright, but she fell into
the same fate as now.
"I was just like you"\. she said while the mighty demon
still running with her.\. She lifted her right hand, and
a pile of light shone trough her small fingertips.
It was pure white bright, covering every corner of the
hell.\. And all the demons chasing them were banished
into ashes.
She didn't want to do that, but she also doesn't want
to live in suffering.\. Suffering was created by
other people,\. and if they are gone,\. she will be happy.
"Hey, mighty demon..."\.\.
"Thank you for everything,\. I am sorry."
<It's snowstorm, but you couldn't feel any cold>
<Feelings,\. nor free will is needed inside you. For
it will interfere with other's need>
<You are the hero.\. The sacrifice.\. A creature born
from sufferings,\. for sufferings>
<But,\. One day,\. She came.\. Dying in the middle of
the blizzard>
<Sera.\. It was her name.\. It means 'princess'>
<She was silent at first, but started to be open more
with the time being>
<Everyday, she would be the reason for you to keep
fighting.\. She filled the void in your heart>
<The void that everybody wants you to keep>
<She was a princess of the spotlights, wearing a mask
to decieve the 'Gods' was her only job"
<Feelings, nor free will is needed from her. She is
like a puppet in a puppet show>
<In any fairytales,\. the happy princess will always
be with the hero,\. not another prince>
<For the hero is the only one who understood her,\. and
able to accept her the most>
<The hero is for the princess, and the princess is
for the hero. It's always been like that>
